languages.text: "Я всего лишь подвела истинные итоги вашего похода на этот мир. Итоги, избавленные от сомнительных переменных вроде заявленных благих намерений и приуменьшенных последствий".
"All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."
languages.original_text: "Я всего лишь подвела истинные итоги вашего похода на этот мир. Итоги, избавленные от сомнительных переменных вроде заявленных благих намерений и приуменьшенных последствий".

traits.locale_text: "All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition. A summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."
"All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition. A summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."
"All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."
"All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."
"All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."
"All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."

languages.text: "Ich habe lediglich die Ergebnisse Eurer Expedition zusammengefasst ... eine Kombination aus angeblich guten Absichten und heruntergespielten Konsequenzen."
languages.original_text: "All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe lediglich die Ergebnisse Eurer Expedition zusammengefasst ... eine Kombination aus angeblich guten Absichten und heruntergespielten Konsequenzen."

languages.text: « Je me suis contentée de résumer les résultats de votre expédition, en supprimant les éléments contestables comme les déclarations de bonnes intentions et la minimisation des conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis contentée de résumer les résultats de votre expédition, en supprimant les éléments contestables comme les déclarations de bonnes intentions et la minimisation des conséquences. »

languages.text: “我所做的一切，不过是对那场调查的结果进行了总结，消除了所有真实性存疑的内容。比如说，某人宣称自己的做法完全出于好意，再比如，某人刻意不肯强调结果。”
languages.original_text: "All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."

traits.locale_text: “我所做的一切，不过是对那场调查的结果进行了总结，消除了所有真实性存疑的内容。比如说，某人宣称自己的做法完全出于好意，再比如，某人刻意不肯强调结果。”

languages.text: «Me limité a proporcionar un resumen de los resultados de su expedición, eliminando atribuciones dudosas como declaraciones de buenas intenciones y una falta de énfasis en las consecuencias».
languages.original_text: "All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."

traits.locale_text: «Me limité a proporcionar un resumen de los resultados de su expedición, eliminando atribuciones dudosas como declaraciones de buenas intenciones y una falta de énfasis en las consecuencias».

languages.text: 「私がしたことは、善意の宣言や曖昧にされた結果などの怪しげな要素を取り除き、あなたの遠征の結果を要約しただけです」
languages.original_text: "All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."

traits.locale_text: 「私がしたことは、善意の宣言や曖昧にされた結果などの怪しげな要素を取り除き、あなたの遠征の結果を要約しただけです」

languages.text: "Yaptığım tek şey, keşif gezinizin sonuçlarını özet şeklinde sunmaktı. Bunu yaparken de iyi niyet beyanları ve önemsizleştirilmiş sonuçlar gibi şüphe uyandıran nitelikleri çıkardım."
languages.original_text: "All I did was provide a summary of the results of your expedition — a summary stripped of dubious attributes such as declarations of good intentions and de-emphasised consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Yaptığım tek şey, keşif gezinizin sonuçlarından bir özet sunmaktı. Bu özeti sunarken de iyi niyet beyanları ve önemsizleştirilmiş sonuçlar gibi şüphe uyandıran niteliklerden kurtuldum."
